week2.answer: Population grows in geometric progression, food supply increases in arithmetic progression

week2.question: The demographic transition sees a society move from
options: high birth rate, low death rate to low birth rate, high death rate
low birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, low death rate
high birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, low death rate
high birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, high death rate
week2.answer: high birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, low death rate
